title: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World

sources.title: It's A Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World (1963) Spencer Tracy Â· Milton Berle
sources.description: The treasure of an unfortunate burglar triggers a race to the place where the money is buried. Everyone involved falls victim to their greed, while a cool-headed police detective watches from a distance.

metadata.Plot: The story begins during a massive traffic jam caused by reckless driver Smiler Grogan, who, before kicking the bucket, cryptically tells the assembled drivers that he's buried a fortune in stolen loot under the Big W. All of the motorists set out to find the fortune.
metadata.Actors: Spencer Tracy, Milton Berle, Ethel Merman
